sources.title: Roxie Hart (1942)
sources.description: A café in Chicago, 1942. On a rainy night, veteran reporter Homer Howard tells an increasing audience the story of Roxie Hart and the crime she was judged for in 1927. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/roxie-hart-1942/

metadata.Plot: To try and kick-start her show-business career, our heroine admits to a Chicago murder. But although Cook County don't seem to let dames swing, and even with top slippery lawyer Billy Flynn, it's all something of a gamble.
metadata.Writer: Nunnally Johnson, Maurine Dallas Watkins, Ben Hecht
metadata.Actors: Ginger Rogers, Adolphe Menjou, George Montgomery
